articles.content:
Harry Brook went past Colin de Grandhomme to become the fastest to complete 1000 Test runs in terms of balls.

articles.description: Luis Suarez retired in 1973 at Sampdoria, going on to coach both the Genoa side and Inter, as well as Como and Cagliari.
